hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that the song taught by the #Ocarina of Time# is #Epona's Song#.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that #Goron City# is on the way of the hero.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that #a Gold Skulltula Token# can be found at #Zora's River#.

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that #inside Ganon's Castle# hoards #a Gerudo Training Ground Small Key#.

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that in the #Sacred Forest Meadow#, Sheik teaches #the Sun's Song#.

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: They say that #the Forest Temple# is on the way of the hero.

GC (Maze).text: I am the King of Gossip Stones, but fear not - I have the common touch! That means I can make conversation with everyone^from foreign dignitaries to the lowliest bumpkin - such as yourself!

GC (Medigoron).text: They say that ##the Bottom of the Well## has #3# major items.

GV (Waterfall).text: They say that past a #silver block in the Spirit Temple# boulders and a melody conceal...^ #a Gold Skulltula Token# and #a Deku Tree Compass#.
hinted_locations: Spirit Temple Early Adult Right Chest

Graveyard (Shadow Temple).text: They say that ##the Gerudo Training Ground## has #1# major item.

HC (Malon).text: They say that ##the Sacred Forest Meadow## has #3# major items.

HC (Rock Wall).text: They say that a #cow behind webs# in a grotto gifts #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

HC (Storms Grotto).text: They say all toasters toast toast.

HF (Cow Grotto).text: They say that amidst flames in #Kakariko Village#, Sheik gives #the Bolero of Fire#.

HF (Near Market Grotto).text: They say that plundering #the Deku Tree# is a foolish choice.

HF (Open Grotto).text: They say that a #tent in the valley# covers a sandy grotto with #fragile walls#.

HF (Southeast Grotto).text: They say that ##Kakariko Village## has #10# major items.

KF (Deku Tree Left).text: They say that #Malon's obstacle course# leads to #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

KF (Deku Tree Right).text: They say that plundering #the Market# is a foolish choice.

KF (Outside Storms).text: They say that #a Red Rupee# can be found in #Hyrule Field#.

KF (Storms Grotto).text: They say that #a Gerudo Training Ground Small Key# can be found at #Zora's River#.

Kak (Open Grotto).text: They say that #the Death Mountain Trail# is on the path to #the Tower#.

LH (Lab).text: They say that #a Gerudo Training Ground Small Key# can be found at #Lake Hylia#.

LH (Southeast Corner).text: They say that #the Sacred Forest Meadow# is on the path of #time#.

LH (Southwest Corner).text: They say that Okami is the best Zelda game.

LW (Bridge).text: They say that a #fountain wall# hides the #Kakariko Potion Shop#.

LW (Near Shortcuts Grotto).text: They say that amidst flames in #Kakariko Village#, Sheik gives #the Bolero of Fire#.

SFM (Maze Lower).text: They say that #Gerudo Valley# is on the way of the hero.

SFM (Maze Upper).text: They say that #Ganon's Tower# is protected by a powerful barrier.

SFM (Saria).text: They say that the #Ice Cavern# corridors ring with #Zelda's Lullaby#.

ToT (Left).text: They say that in the #crater, a spider in a crate and a single scrub# guard...^ #the Pocket Cucco# and #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

ToT (Left-Center).text: They say that a #storm within Zora's Domain# reveals the #Treasure Box Shop#.

ToT (Right).text: They say that #a Gold Skulltula Token# can be found on #the Death Mountain Trail#.

ToT (Right-Center).text: They say that a rock on #a ledge in the valley# hides a #generic grotto#.

ZD (Mweep).text: They say that #at the Desert Colossus#, skulltulas at night hold...^ #a Blue Rupee# and #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

ZF (Fairy).text: They say that #Malon's obstacle course# leads to #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

ZR (Near Domain).text: They say that plundering #the Shadow Temple# is a foolish choice.

ZR (Near Grottos).text: They say that #the Death Mountain Trail# is on the path to the #Forest Medallion#.

ZR (Open Grotto).text: They say that the song taught by the #Ocarina of Time# is #Epona's Song#.
